nodes.goal: Isolate the term with x on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 7 from both sides to eliminate the constant term on the left side.

nodes.goal: Simplify the equation further by isolating x
nodes.plan: Divide both sides of the equation by 3 to solve for x.

nodes.goal: Verify that the solution satisfies the original equation
nodes.plan: Substitute x = 5 back into the original equation to check if both sides are equal.
